activities:
We collect health and fitness information related to a person subscribed to our online system. Information includes calories burned, calories consumed, steps, minutes of physical activity and minutes of sleep.

We also collect personal information related to the transaction for payment of the subscription, such as name, address, email.

A full description of the information is contained in the privacy policy.
